WorkItem.ClosedComment: Finally repro'd it, fixed with commit 51777
WorkItem.Description: While inputting my items, I suddenly lost the gem tooltips across all items.

Comments.Message: I think I got the same situation.  It appears that the option "Display Gem Names in Tooltips" does not have an effect.  Regardless of whether it is selected or not, I am not seeing gem names in Rawr 3.  This applies to both equipped gear (left pane) and potential gear (the right hand pane).

I've just gad the issue where the whole gems disappear from all the tooltips.   It looks like it has no gems.    The socket bonus still shows (and is greyed out or not depending on what gems are there) but no actual gems.   The slots are still there in the edit mode so it seem to be just a display issue.     

I was editing items to add socket bonuses and adding custom gemmings before trying to click on the slot in the paper doll to change to a different gemming when it happened.
@KyrosKrane: The Display Gem Names works now as of r51737. Your comment was unrelated to the OP'rs issue
